alpa nanasala pahasukam thuladi (aayathanaya sathuwanne pariganaka yantha්ra 4k pamani* oba thumanlage shilpasayurata dakwu kapawima unanduwa itha sarthakayi, oba thumanlage magapenwim danuwath karim mathin ma hata shilpasayurata labadun sisun 100 ilakkayada kisima abhiyogayak nomathiwa ema ilakkaya abhimawa gos apa nanasale aadayam thathwayada ihala nanwa ganimata haki wu bawa sathutin danum demi’.

diwayina pura eka lesata pariganaka saksharathawayak pawathwa gena yamata nam diwayine sama pradeshayakama pasal walata pariganakagara laba diya yuthuya.
anisi balapam walata erehi wemu.
me nawa thakshanaya thawath wasara kihipayakin owunge pariganaka wala dakaganimata hakiwethayi apeksha karanna puluwan.
obage mulya shakthiya durwala wimata eya balapanawa.
dan api katha kala mulika karana dekak gana , eelangata awasana karunu deka gana ekaparatama wisthara karaganna puluwan wewi.
eeth dakunu amarikawedima pamanayi.
okkoma salli gewala mage kredit kad eka kansol karanna kiyala kata kadenakam kiyalath, liyum liyalath, rupiyal atak gewanna thibenawaya kiyala gahala,
mulu jiwithayakma ee eka liyumaka kati karala thiyenawa...

ikon...mama ahasayi, polawayi athara thiyena sahasambandathawaya therum gaththe, ehema dekak thiyenawa kiyana eka dakala saha danna nisa pamanayi.

in pasuwa podujana eksath peramuna gena eemata balaporoththu wu deshapalana yojanawaliya sakasimatath eya idiriyata gena yamatath sahaya laba denne da jathin athara samangiya athikirimata eyin labagatha haki pitiwahala nisa ya.

oya okkoma dewal ekka mama sahenda lankawa athule awidda.
danata masa kihipayakata pera lankadipa pathraye unwahansege apawathwima pilibandawa lipiyak palawi thibini...

eeka ahala mage ammayi, thaththayi godak sathutu wuna.

krushikarmanthaya mulika artha kramaya washayen pawathi merata ema yapum margaya paraya yana tharam suwishala aadayamak thabarum sanskruthiya haraha meratata labena bawa pahadiliya. 2000 wasara wana wita merata warshika mathpan panaya litarÊmiliyana panas ekakda, sara mathpan panaya litar miliyana panashatharakda wiya. 2009 wana wita warshika bira paribhojanaya litar miliyana panashatharak dakwada sara mathpan panaya litar miliyana haththapaha dakwada warthagatha lesa wardhanaya wi atha. 2007 wasare mathpanwalin meratata lada aadayama biliyana wisithuna ikmawayi. 2008 wana wita eya biliyana wisihathakata adhikaya.

poda perawaru 6.00 –7.00 sil samadan karawima saha anushasanaya aacharya mirisse dhammika nahimi. 7.00 – 7.15 theruwan wandanawa , 8.00 – 9.30 bhawanawa,aacharya mirisse dhammika nahimi, 9.45 – 10.45 dharma deshanawa aacharya mirisse dhammika nahimi, 11.00 – 11.15 theruwan wandanawa paswaru 12.30 – 1.00 suthra deshanawa aluthwela dhammasathi himi, bangaladeshaye himi , 1.00 – 2.00 dharma deshanawa shasthrapathi thalalle chandakiththi mahimi .2.00 –3.30 dharma sakachchawa shasthrapathi madawala dhammika jinawansa nahimi, 4.00 –5.00 bhawanawa pitakande aananda kirthi mahimi, 5.00 –6.00 dharma deshanaya shasthrapathi thalpathwawa saddhathissa mahimi, 7.00 atawisi buddha wandanawa.wallawaththe jathyanthara bauddha madhyasthana wiharaye wesak pura pasaloswaka poho dina dawasa pura pawathwena shila samadana katayuthu maharagama mahinda nahimiyange anushasakathwayen pawathwe.perawaru 5.30 ta 2600 sambuddhathwa jayanthiya nimiththen wiharasthanaya idiripita idikarana lada samadhi buddha prathimawa wiwrutha kirima.
